title: Where We Get Energy
description: Where We Get Energy gives readers an informative lesson in where our energy comes from. The book reviews how we use energy, which types of energy we use, and where each energy type is found. Clear, easy-to-understand photographs enhance the text.
highFrequencyWords: electricity, energy, fuel, generator, natural gas, solar cells
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
